MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. Altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and simple business plan calculators for everyone.
At Dynamic Applications, we are Sharing Economy. Follow us to gain. We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. We work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
RoboSoft.Comments_For_Reviewer:
The Universal Promo Code is:
DLROW-III-MODEL
Everyone can find out about it, as it can be found within the Tweets of @dynamic_qs, our Roadmap voting. Thank you for testing, reviewing, and supporting us. Your comments are our inspiration.
Martin Bernhardt, Founder of Dynamic Applications.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy publishing free Business Planners.
Site.Site_Description_250: Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on customers, product cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models. Your very own.
Site.Site_Description_450:
Dynamic Applications is a small business consultancy focused on customers, cost, efficiency, sales, and net profit. We support Startups in developing 21st century Business Models.
We're driven by thousands of independent voters. altogether, we develop Perfect Desire, an evolving platform of free and easy business planners for everyone.
We vote in online democracy, we deliver for free. we work for you, and we call them Dynamic Applications.
Site.Site_Keywords: Dynamic Applications, Startup, Small Business, Home Business, Business Model, Business Plan, Sharing Economy.

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: v5.92 - supports .NET 5.0 Desktop Environment and Setup. v5.87 - new SDUI MessageBox with decent, fine dark design. v5.76 - smooth Time Ruler with integrated painting of Date and Time functionality.
Program_Info.Program_Categories: Kids Education,Teaching Tools,Teaching,Education,Food,Food & Drink,Food & Beverage,Business Training,Small Business,Personal Interest,Hobby,Kids,Personal Finance,Finance,Home
Program_Info.Limitations: The integrated Formula Editors are only available for the first 12 Input and Target Values.

Press_Release.Press_Release:
Eat an Apple, save its Seeds, grow small Tree in your House Garden. Watch your Tree growing. From year 7, sell them on street. Define your Price. Pluck 10 Apples per Customer.
Open a very small business. Apple Tree plans it perfectly.
Includes Apple Tree simulation, Bakery Tutorial, a Multi-Material calculator, a Water Supply intro simulation, Dynamic Idea and Roadmap Competition, and a freely configurable Time Ruler with 10..240 mon/years.
The software's Formulas are fully Transparent through automated, interactive ToolTips on demand. Dynamic Applications are gathering no data at all, so you can plan secretly and don't have to worry.
Overall, Apple Tree is an interesting example of defining a very small business and living a basic life from home.

Press_Release.Headline: Dynamic Applications releases Apple Tree, one of world's most history Small Business calculations.
Press_Release.Summary: Dynamic Applications releases Apple Tree, world's most history Small Business calculation, a freeware business planner for maintaining an Apple Tree Garden.
Press_Release.Keywords: Apple, Tree, Apple Tree, Garden, Small Business, Home Business, Dynamic Applications, System Dynamics, Sharing Economy.

English.Char_Desc_45: an Apple Tree in your garden. all you need.
English.Char_Desc_80: Apple Tree is world's most historic, well-known Small Business calculation.
English.Char_Desc_250: Eat an Apple, save its Seeds, grow small Tree in your House Garden. Watch your Tree growing. From year 7, sell Apples on the street. Define your Price. Pluck 10 Apples per Customer. Open a very small business. Apple Tree plans it perfectly.
English.Char_Desc_450: Eat an Apple, save its Seeds, grow small Tree in your House Garden. Watch your Tree growing. From year 7, sell them on street. Define your Price. Pluck 10 Apples per Customer. Open a very small business. Apple Tree plans it perfectly. Includes Apple Tree simulation, Bakery Tutorial, a Multi-Material calculator, a Water Supply - Well builder calculator, Dynamic Idea and Roadmap Competition, and a configurable Time Ruler.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Eat an Apple, save its Seeds, grow small Tree in your House Garden. Watch your Tree growing. From year 7, sell them on street. Define your Price. Pluck 10 Apples per Customer.
Open a very small business. Apple Tree plans it perfectly.
Includes the Bakery Tutorial, a Multi-Material Tool builder calculator, the Apple Tree simulation (easily customizable for similar vegetables), an Apple Tree Plantage calculator for starting up a professional business, a Water Supply - Well Builder intro simulation, The Dynamic Idea and Roadmap Competition, and a configurable Time Ruler.
The software's Formulas are fully Transparent through automated, interactive ToolTips on demand. Dynamic Applications are gathering no data at all, so you can plan secretly and don't have to worry.
Overall, Apple Tree is an interesting example of defining a very small business and living a basic life from home.
